DBsheetConfig.query: SELECT T1.CurveId, T1.GroupingId, T1.CurveDescription, T5.value Currency, T6.value Type, T7.id DiscountCurve, T8.value DayCounter, T1.RecoveryRate, T10.Id Conventions, T11.id BenchmarkCurve, T12.id SourceCurve, T1.Pillars, T1.SpotLag, T15.value Calendar, T16.value Extrapolation FROM ORE.dbo.CurveConfigurationDefaultCurves T1 LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesCurrencyCode T5 ON T1.Currency = T5.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesDefaultCurveType T6 ON T1.Type = T6.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TodaysMarketCurveSpecs T7 ON T1.DiscountCurve = T7.id LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesDayCounter T8 ON T1.DayCounter = T8.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.ConventionsCDS T10 ON T1.Conventions = T10.Id LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TodaysMarketCurveSpecs T11 ON T1.BenchmarkCurve = T11.id LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TodaysMarketCurveSpecs T12 ON T1.SourceCurve = T12.id LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesCalendar T15 ON T1.Calendar = T15.value LEFT JOIN ORE.dbo.TypesBool T16 ON T1.Extrapolation = T16.value

field.name: Currency
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value Currency, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesCurrencyCode !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: Type
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value Type, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesDefaultCurveType !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: DiscountCurve
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.id DiscountCurve,!T!.id FROM ORE.dbo.TodaysMarketCurveSpecs !T! ORDER BY id

field.name: DayCounter
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value DayCounter, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesDayCounter !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: Conventions
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.Id Conventions, !T!.Id FROM ORE.dbo.ConventionsCDS !T! ORDER BY Id

field.name: BenchmarkCurve
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.id BenchmarkCurve,!T!.id FROM ORE.dbo.TodaysMarketCurveSpecs !T! ORDER BY id

field.name: SourceCurve
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.id SourceCurve,!T!.id FROM ORE.dbo.TodaysMarketCurveSpecs !T! ORDER BY id

field.name: Calendar
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value Calendar, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesCalendar !T! ORDER BY value

field.name: Extrapolation
field.lookup: SELECT !T!.value Extrapolation, !T!.value FROM ORE.dbo.TypesBool !T! ORDER BY value
